resources.string: Push-ups are a fundamental bodyweight exercise that strengthens the chest, shoulders, and triceps. Begin in a plank position, lower your body by bending your elbows, and then push back up, engaging your core for stability. They\'re versatile, effective, and can be modified for various fitness levels.

Pull-ups are an upper-body exercise that targets the back, biceps, and shoulders. Hang from a horizontal bar with an overhand grip, then pull your body upward until your chin clears the bar. It\'s an excellent bodyweight exercise for building upper body strength.
